channel.title: This section
channel.description:
Hey, as just being a clan section wasn't hauling in that many users I have decided to change this board to incorporate events as well as clans.
What this means is that if you are deciding to host a gaming event (A meet up, a demonstration etc etc) it will go in this section. It is my understanding that this will allow us to organize these events better and get a better turn out. So for example, as we had a swass sticka Runescape meet up that was set to take place a while ago and nobody turned up, we will now post that here.
So to summarize; What goes in this section:
[ul][li]Clan discussion & recruitment[/li] [li]Gaming events[/li][/ul]
Enjoy!
